deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Simply a rock-paper-scissors game with a commitment scheme to avoid front-running attacks. 
 1 (FUNDING state). Both players must first fund the game with the agreedStake amount
 2 (COMMITMENT state). Then they will commit to their action ("ROCK", "PAPER" or "SCISSORS")
 3 (REVEAL state). When both have committed, they will reveal their action and the winner is designated.
                     In the case of a draw, goto 2.
 4 (WON state). The winner can withdraw his prise.
 5 (FINISHED state). The owner can kill the contract, any remaining funds are sent to the owner.

documentation.text: @notice both players must put the amount at stake in the contract
@notice during the FUNDING phase, the players still can withdraw their funds
@notice after the FUNDING phase, each player will commit to his action

@notice after the COMMITMENT phase, each player will reveal his action, the commitment value is checked, and
         the battle ends with a winner, or a draw
@notice once the winner is designated, the winner can withdraw the prize

@notice when the game is finished or if the game is stalled for more thant a week
         , the owner can destruct the contract and reimburse the players if wanted

Fabric for rock-paper-scissors games
 nothing to see here

Simply a rock-paper-scissors game with a commitment scheme to avoid front-running attacks. 
 1 (FUNDING state). Both players must first fund the game with the agreedStake amount
 2 (COMMITMENT state). Then they will commit to their action ("ROCK", "PAPER" or "SCISSORS")
 3 (REVEAL state). When both have committed, they will reveal their action and the winner is designated.
                     In the case of a draw, goto 2.
 4 (WON state). The winner can withdraw his prise.
 5 (FINISHED state). The owner can kill the contract, any remaining funds are sent to the owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

commitToAction(bytes32).notice: after the FUNDING phase, each player will commit to his action

fundGame().notice: both players must put the amount at stake in the contract

killSwitch().notice: when the game is finished or if the game is stalled for more thant a week         , the owner can destruct the contract and reimburse the players if wanted

reveal(string).notice: after the COMMITMENT phase, each player will reveal his action, the commitment value is checked, and         the battle ends with a winner, or a draw

unfundGame().notice: during the FUNDING phase, the players still can withdraw their funds

withdraw().notice: once the winner is designated, the winner can withdraw the prize

userdoc.notice: Simply a rock-paper-scissors game with a commitment scheme to avoid front-running attacks.  1 (FUNDING state). Both players must first fund the game with the agreedStake amount 2 (COMMITMENT state). Then they will commit to their action ("ROCK", "PAPER" or "SCISSORS") 3 (REVEAL state). When both have committed, they will reveal their action and the winner is designated.                     In the case of a draw, goto 2. 4 (WON state). The winner can withdraw his prise. 5 (FINISHED state). The owner can kill the contract, any remaining funds are sent to the owner.
